name: WitchCraft (itch) (slicknickicarus)
description:
Lenny O’Lantern is cottage-sitting for the witch’s magical hat shop! With nothing but a scribbled page of barely-helpful instructions, he must master her many bizarre manufacturing techniques to keep her customers’ heads covered in style.

Created for the September 2022 Cozy Autumn Game Jam
for Firith Studio
The theme was Cozy Autumn and the optional mechanic was One Room Only.

***Known Bug***
Feeding the Cauldron an incorrect hat causes the game to break. We suggest feeding the basket instead! We also blame Boblin.

KEYBOARD & MOUSE CONTROLS
WASD: move
LEFT MOUSE: Pickup/Drop hat
RIGHT MOUSE: Interact with the nearest object

CREDITS
Nicholas Pankuch - Game Design & Engineering
Dryden Meints - Sound, Music, & Visual Design
Alyssa Cooper - Visual Design
Boblin the Goblin - General Mischief Developer
